title: Riot can you add a system like : "check pinger"  before champ select?
body:
Hi everyone,

I apologize for my poor english coz im a noob french who played from new caledonia(server OCE).
Well, i have a request for RIOT GAMES.
Can you add a system which check player's ping when he click on the button : "Play ranked solo/duo" (at least in this mod, it the most interresting for several players according to me).

so a logical like this :
---------------------------------------------------
click on button "PLAY" -> check ping -> if ping >101ms  you cant play ranked but u can play others mods -> else -> join queue .

for all community it would be good i think for all players to play with good pings.
how many times we saw ADC or MIDLANE "alt+PING" showing their beautiful ms more than 200++...letting you in 4 V5 and -> ff15
(its a example among many others)

Thanks .

Sorry again for my english and my tired emotion.

 Sincerely,

Dev*

ps : btw im silver  5 u can add me at "Devasta" cya

replies.body:
So people who don't live in the city or can't afford good systems should be banned from playing ranked? Ping doesn't make a player THAT bad. I was able to get gold with 300 ping when there was no OCE server.

There are even challengers with 150 ping who stream.

It's not so much the ping itself (within reason), but more the stability of it. 300 ping that is constant and doesn't fluctuate is playable. Ping that is jumping between 80-350 not so much because it's unpredictable. I like the idea of a ping checker, not so much the idea of a ping restriction.
